001
002package com.commercetools.compat;
003
004import io.sphere.sdk.client.SphereClientConfig;
005import io.vrap.rmf.base.client.ApiHttpClient;
006import io.vrap.rmf.base.client.ClientBuilder;
007import io.vrap.rmf.base.client.oauth2.ClientCredentials;
008
009public class CompatClientFactory {
010    public static ApiHttpClient of(SphereClientConfig clientConfig) {
011        return ClientBuilder.of()
012                .defaultClient(clientConfig.getApiUrl())
013                .withClientCredentialsFlow(ClientCredentials.of()
014                        .withClientId(clientConfig.getClientId())
015                        .withClientSecret(clientConfig.getClientSecret())
016                        .build(),
017                    clientConfig.getAuthUrl())
018                .build();
019    }
020
021    public static CompatClient ofCompat(SphereClientConfig clientConfig) {
022        return CompatClient.of(ClientBuilder.of()
023                .defaultClient(clientConfig.getApiUrl())
024                .withClientCredentialsFlow(ClientCredentials.of()
025                        .withClientId(clientConfig.getClientId())
026                        .withClientSecret(clientConfig.getClientSecret())
027                        .build(),
028                    clientConfig.getAuthUrl())
029                .build(),
030            clientConfig.getProjectKey());
031    }
032}
